statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{5 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 5 , 5 \, x^{2} - x + 4 , -6 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 6 \, x + 5 , 4 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + x , 2 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
